jp_text: でも 分かってても 助けられるわけじゃねえよな
google_translated: But even if I know it is not good

en_text: I want to, but...
jp_text: そりゃ 助けたいけど んなことできるヤツは…
google_translated: If you want to help, the guy who can do it ...

en_text: Oh yeah, one of them's right here.
jp_text: あっ そっか　ここにいた

en_text: Right!
jp_text: よし！

en_text: Stop... please...
jp_text: やめて …くれ！

en_text: Hey! You're gonna kill him if you keep that up!
jp_text: おいおい… 殺しちゃうぞ それじゃ

en_text: Say it! Say, "I won't do this again!"
jp_text: 言え！ “もう しません”って言え！
google_translated: say!"I will not do it anymore"!

en_text: Man, he's scary.
jp_text: こいつ 怖え…

en_text: What's that?
jp_text: な… 何だ？

en_text: What's that? It's the beginning of a brand new day
jp_text: な… 何だ？

en_text: It's the beginning of a brand new day
jp_text: な… 何だ？

en_text: Outta my way! Open your heart to happiness
jp_text: どけ！

en_text: Outta my way! And look up at the big, blue sky
jp_text: どけ！

en_text: And look up at the big, blue sky
jp_text: どけ！

en_text: What's that? With the fragrant air what's that? one! two! three! let's go!
jp_text: あれ 何だよ？

en_text: the people they're after snarl at them, shout, fight, and get deeply wounded.
jp_text: 追い詰められた人々は牙をむき 叫び 戦い 深く傷ついていく
google_translated: People who were chased shaved the fangs and get hurt deeply

en_text: Would your old self have been able to face the fangs of darkness?
jp_text: かつての自分なら 闇の牙と対峙していただろうか？
google_translated: Want to face the dark fangs if they were one of them?

en_text: Next time: "They Aren't Human"
jp_text: 次回 “人間じゃねぇ”
google_translated: Next time "I'm not a human being"
